author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P 500 ends barely higher; Amazon a boost
text:
NEW YORK, April 27 (Reuters) - The S&P 500 and Nasdaq closed slightly higher on Friday as inflation worries and some struggling technology and energy stocks were offset by an advance in the consumer discretionary sector, led by Amazon .
Based on the latest available data, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 11.15 points, or 0.05 percent, to 24,311.19, the S&P 500 gained 2.97 points, or 0.11 percent, to 2,669.91 and the Nasdaq Composite added 1.12 points, or 0.02 percent, to 7,119.80. (Reporting by Caroline Valetkevitch, Editing by Rosalba Oâ€™Brien)
